subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A 50-minute pregame meeting proved to be nothing but talk for the Yankees, who fell meekly to the Toronto Blue Jays Monday night, their fourth loss in a row and 12th in 17 games.
snippet: A 50-minute pregame meeting proved to be nothing but talk for the Yankees, who fell meekly to the Toronto Blue Jays Monday night, their fourth loss in a row and 12th in 17 games.
